info.description: A digital issue module of cards with image and text alternating per card
info.documentation:
# SUPPORTED BOVD PROPERTIES (IN "MODULES") - "deks": an array of one or more paragraphs from BOVD for each item in the staggered block. If any item within the staggered block doesnâ€™t have a dek, put `null`. (Ex: ["dek one", null, null, "dek four"])
This module will display 1 - n number of cards, alternating the order of the image/text position per card. It defaults to image on the left and text on the right. This can be overridden with a variation.
It extends the Default Digital Issue Module by adding optional properties:
Built-in variations: mntl-di-staggered-block--image-right - swaps the order from image / text to text / image
